name: Match Paradise Prototype
description:
A prototype to experiment with different ways to add unique game elements to the classic match 3 game. 

Endless Mode

Match pieces to gain points, charge your boosters, and keep control of the infestation that creeps across the map.

Infestation

Infestation can be both useful and troubling. Fully infested pieces will not move back if moved and unmatched, however there is a good chance the piece they swap with will also be infested. If the map becomes too infested, they could trigger an event to swarm the map with obstacles

Boosters

Currently 12 basic boosters are available with plans to add many more. These boosters are charged from the matching of pieces on the map and can provide many advantages.
